references.paper_title: Lapicque's introduction of the integrate-and-fire model neuron (1907)
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the understanding of the leaky integrate-and-fire model used as inspiration for the proposed PPLNs.
This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of the field of event-based vision, which is the domain where the proposed PPLNs are applied.

references.paper_title: DDD20 end-to-end event camera driving dataset: Fusing frames and events with deep learning for improved steering prediction
references.reason: The DDD20 dataset is one of the main datasets used for experimental evaluation of the proposed PPLNs, making this dataset description paper highly important.

references.paper_title: DHP19: Dynamic vision sensor 3D human pose dataset
references.reason: Another main dataset used for experimental evaluation of the proposed PPLNs is the DHP19 dataset, making this dataset description paper highly important.
The architecture of the proposed PPLNs is inspired by KANs, which is considered a state-of-the-art approach for deep network design, making this paper highly relevant.
